(Birdbot is shot in his shoulder. He quickly moves his right hand, avoiding=
 the staff by inches. He laughs at Aerotaur. He wouldn't attack though. He =
first wanted an answer from Nightlight...)

  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, =
August 16, 2001 6:26 PM
  Subject: Re: BIRDBOT!


  ::Aerotaur:: 
        H=
e stood very still unsure of how Birdbot would react.  He slowly 
  circled=
 toward the wall so as to get a clean shot at Birdbot.  Without 
  lifting =
his left hand too high he fired a shot at Birdbot.  He simultaneously 
  sw=
ung with his bladed staff in his right hand.
